org.springframework.http.codec

类 BodyExtractors

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.springframework.http.codec.BodyExtractors

  • public abstract class BodyExtractors
extends Object
    Implementations of BodyExtractor that read various bodies, such a reactive streams.
    从以下版本开始:
    5.0
    作者:
    Arjen Poutsma
